package.name: create_driver
package.description:
Driver for iRobot Create and Roomba
This is a generic driver for iRobot Create that currently holds implementations for Turtlebot and Roomba. Port of pyrobot.py by Damon Kohler. It is currently labeled as turtlebot_driver pending review by the entire create community before using the name create_driver.
For ROS bindings, please see turtlebot_node.
